name: Stuck (SelfishPanda)
description:
The world is changing and getting harder and harder to live in, and it was already hard enough! You need to keep up our mental health and maintain enough energy to take care of yourself, all the while making sure you’re productive enough to get the important things in life done!

Sometimes it just becomes so much and it’s even worse now that we’re in lockdown, all of this just makes us feel…Stuck.

There are ways to make things easier though, taking care of yourself by eating food and keeping yourself clean, and most importantly establishing routines so that you can gain more of a boost from a predictable lifestyle.

You’ve got to keep sane though and doing the same thing every day leads to a boring and monotonous life, so be sure to switch it up every now and then!

 

CONTROLS:

Click and drag actions from the conveyor belt onto the screen to perform them

TAB to view your current routines

SPACE to bring up your phone to read how your friends are reacting to the pandemic
